entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 6:16 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:16 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
